adventure.description: Whether it appears below usual sources, in the Adventure category.

accessory.description: Whether or not something is an accessory, like a deck of cards.

vanilla.description: Whether it is considered a "Core" source, and is filterable through the "Select Vanilla Sources" option.

unreleased.description:
Whether a source is unreleased, with no information on it whatsoever yet.
